pullrequest.title: Display appropriate fields when opening inspector

content.raw: is this trying to block the `Applied()` signal from `OnJointTypeChanged`?  Not sure if it makes sense to move the `Applied()` signal from `OnJointTypeChanged` to `OnEnumChanged` since it looks like it's the only place  `OnJointTypeChanged` is called. Then we don't need to block here any more.
